section.heading: Annual report.
section.text: The Office of Business and Economic Development shall annually prepare a report for the Committee on Economic Development which shall describe in detail the operations of each business incubator, including, but not limited to, a discussion of:

para.text: The business operation of each tenant business;

The impact of the product or service provided to the public and the job training opportunities of each tenant business to the economic development objectives of the city for which the tenant business was selected;
The employment benefits and revenues to the District as a result of the establishment of the business incubator;
Any recurrent problems experienced in the management of the business incubator as well as the recommended corrective action;
Any financial or technical assistance provided to a tenant business by the public or private sector;
The establishment and implementation of business incubator policies, rules, and regulations; and
Any legislative initiatives which would increase the productivity, viability, and economic benefits of business tenants or a business incubator facility.

annotations.annotation: D.C. Law 13-91, in the introductory paragraph, substituted “Committee on Economic Development” for “HED Committee”.
